review: Streaming quality and speed is excellent! Very happy with this purchase. Great value!
author: Tim K

review: My router is "too far away" for this to work on the family TV (in a 1200 sq ft house).  Works fine in bedroom, where it is across the hall from the router.
author: Cathy McFarland

review: EPIC FAIL! Amazon Fire Stick Not Ready For Prime Time.Day 1: Didn't work without  HDMI extender. Looks good. Clear, sharp HD image. Very pleased with Fire Stick. Then, bottom falls out and Fire Stick sucks out. No fire, no connection. Remote has no effect, no control. Frustrated, cursing, Vow to return product.Day 2: Seems to work fine in morning and early afternoon, then at night...same problems, after good reception for about 20 minutes, picture starts freezing, sound continues, then everything blacks out. Hit Pause, then Play, show resumes for maybe two-minute intervals, always with picture freezing. This goes on for about 5 pause/plays and finally we get frustrated and shut the whole thing off and go back to Roku. Roku reception: fine. Fire Stick dependability: 0.What the hell happened, Amazon? You should work the bugs out before you take peoples' money. Shame on you.I am returning this thing for a refund. Thanks for the waste of time and the frustration.
author: Randy Chandler "Randy Chandler"

review: Love it. Its great. I was surprised it came earlier than expected.
author: Memphis Man "eldrick"

review: My Fire TV Stick arrived earlier than original estimate, easy to unpack, install, operate. Does everything it is supposed to. I used it to view Netflix and Amazon Prime video within minutes (seconds?) of unpacking box - no problems.
author: todd lofton

review: got this as a Christmas present for my parents, I find the interface to be relatively easy to use and get through. The power cord is definitely lengthy  enough,  remote is sleek, perfectly sized, and the software is a blaze I didn't have any soft lag! the unit as a whole is very responsive  :]  would recommend
author: JesusAngel

review: Overall it is ok but round button makes cracking noises while using which is very irritating while using.
author: Lalit Malik

review: Slick interface, fairly easy to set up, all the apps I needed were available out of the box (Netflix, Plex, Pandora, Spotify). Especially dig the availability of the screensaver type apps - fireplace, snow scenes, an aquarium - as they help my son go to sleep.Will probably pick up another one to replace the Chromecast in the Master Bedroom.
author: Justin Dupree
